snippet.title: No Straight Roads | "BitSummit Gaiden" Trailer
snippet.description:
Start a rock band. End the EDM empire! NO STRAIGHT ROADS available on PS4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One and PC via the Epic Games Store. Check out the brand new trailer revealed at BitSummit Gaiden 2020!

Join the gig on :
Switch: http://bit.ly/NSRNSW
PS4 (Compatible PS5): http://bit.ly/NSRPS
PC: http://bit.ly/NSREpic
Xbox One (Compatible Series S | X): http://bit.ly/XB1NSR

Merchandising: http://nostraightroads.com/boutique

Lead the musical revolution in NO STRAIGHT ROADS, a rockin’ action-adventure from the minds of Wan Hazmer (Final Fantasy XV) and Daim Dziauddin (Street Fighter V).

Explore Vinyl City and fight musical megastars on your journey to defeat oppressive EDM empire ‘NSR’, and experience an action-packed adventure that mashes together rhythm-infused third-person combat with a kick-ass soundtrack!

https://twitter.com/NoStraightRoads
https://www.facebook.com/NoStraightRoads
https://www.instagram.com/nostraightroads/
https://nostraightroads.com/
